ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Akebono TED thermal electron spectral plots
ResourceHeader.Description: These Akebono Thermal Electron Energy Detecftor (TED) plots display color-coded amplitudes of the second harmonic of incident flux, vs. energy (over 0-5 eV) and time. Each plot covers some or all of one ~3.5 hour orbit.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: In any publications, the use of the Akebono data should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided by K. Oyama through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, JAXA in Japan."

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: In any publications, the use of the Akebono data should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided by K. Oyama through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, JAXA in Japan."
